body:
Is is also interesting that `cargo run` actually shows the error when you apply the patch first time:

```
    Updating git repository `https://github.com/tomaka/winit`
    Updating registry `https://github.com/rust-lang/crates.io-index`
error: failed to select a version for `rusttype`.
    ... required by package `andrew v0.1.2`
    ... which is depended on by `smithay-client-toolkit v0.4.0`
    ... which is depended on by `winit v0.17.2 (https://github.com/tomaka/winit#062bb0ce)`
    ... which is depended on by `glutin v0.18.0`
    ... which is depended on by `hello v0.1.0 (file:///P:/temp/hello)`
versions that meet the requirements `= 0.7.1` are: 0.7.1

all possible versions conflict with previously selected packages.

  previously selected package `rusttype v0.7.2`
    ... which is depended on by `hello v0.1.0 (file:///P:/temp/hello)`

failed to select a version for `rusttype` which could resolve this conflict
```

But `cargo update` doesn't fail, instead it uses another version
